short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract course and date information from UPenn course selection page and export as an iCalendar file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The course selection page for University of Pennsylvania does not directly provide a way to export the courses into your own calendar. Using this extension, users can go to their primary cart of courses and download the generated course schedule calendar file with 1-click.
